name: Full Stack -- Trancendence
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y git-lfs libsqlite3-dev ca-certificates curl gnupg && NODE_MAJOR=20 && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg] https://deb.nodesource.com/node_'$NODE_MAJOR'.x nodistro main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nodesource.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs && sudo npm install -g npm@11.6.2
